item.title: 南非农作物遭遇黑霜可能引发粮食短缺
item.description: 黑霜袭击了南非最北部林波波省的农作物，一个重要的农民组织警告说，该地区的粮食短缺迫在眉睫。【原文：Black frost hit crops in South Africa’s northernmost Limpopo province, with a key farmers’ organization warning of looming food shortages in the region.】

item.description: 全球投资者纷纷重返印度股市，推动印度股票指数屡创新高。【原文：Global investors have returned to Indian stocks, helping to propel the equity gauges to record highs.】

item.title: 尽管存在中国劳工问题，太阳能公司仍获得数百万美元的美国税收抵免
item.description:
韩国韩华称，该公司在佐治亚州的 Qcells 工厂采取措施确保供应链的完整性。但是，该公司从美国官员因在中国强迫劳动而制裁过的供应商的公司采购材料。【原文：

South Korea’s Hanwha says it takes steps to ensure supply-chain integrity at its Qcells plants in Georgia. But it has sourced material from companies with suppliers that US officials have sanctioned over forced labor in China.

item.description:

item.title: 马克龙让法国和市场陷入混乱
item.description:
三方选举的僵局使法国政府几乎成为勒庞的最大输家。她现在拥有全国最大的政党。【原文：

The three-way election stalemate leaves French governance almost as big a loser as Le Pen. And she now has the biggest party in the country.

】

item.title: 法国现在不得不面对它宁愿忽视的债券市场风险
item.description: 法国的政治震荡迫使债券投资者面对现实，即法国的财政赤字是当前的问题，而不是未来几年的问题。【原文：A political shock in France has forced bond investors to confront the reality that the nation’s fiscal deficit is an issue for here and now, not years down the road.】

item.title: 运价下滑为亚洲原油需求敲响警钟
item.description: 随着超级油轮缩短航程和中国需求疲软，亚洲主要航线的原油运输成本正在下降。【原文：The cost of shipping crude oil along key routes to Asia is slumping as supertankers take shorter trips and demand softens in China.】

item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets.】

item.title: 香港山顶大厦售价三个月内下调 12
item.description: 香港山顶一栋豪宅的卖家将要价比 4 月份降低了 12%，这表明豪宅市场持续疲软。【原文：Sellers of a Hong Kong mansion on the Peak reduced their asking price by 12% from April, a sign of continued weakness in the luxury property market.】

item.title: 希尔豪斯长期合伙人大卫-瑞（David Rhee）从亚洲巨头退休
item.description: 一位知情人士表示，希尔豪斯合伙人大卫-瑞（David Rhee）在这家市值超过 1000 亿美元的亚洲投资公司任职 14 年后，于 6 月底退休。【原文：Hillhouse partner David Rhee retired at the end of June after 14 years at the more than $100 billion Asian investment firm, said a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 全球银行是印度债券市场的最大赢家
item.description: 最近几周，受印度经济前景和稳定货币的吸引，外国银行已成为印度万亿美元主权债券市场的最大投资者。【原文：Foreign banks have emerged as the largest investors in India’s trillion dollar sovereign bond market in recent weeks, attracted by the nation’s economic prospects and a stable currency.】

item.title: 日本央行在最终确定削减购债规模前向市场参与者征求意见
item.description: 在接下来的几天里，日本央行将在重要会议上与市场参与者面对面交流，旨在为本月晚些时候宣布的削减债券购买规模的计划确定一个切实可行的步伐。【原文：The Bank of Japan will speak face-to-face with market participants over the next couple of days in key meetings aimed at gauging a realistic pace for a reduction of its bond purchases to be announced later this month.】

item.title: MUFG 银行员工因涉嫌泄露内部信息被调查
item.description: 读卖新闻》（Yomiuri）报道称，日本 MUFG 银行的一名员工涉嫌向家庭成员泄露客户公司的投标报价细节和其他非公开信息，几周前，该银行集团因违反防火墙规定而受到训斥。【原文：An MUFG Bank employee is suspected of leaking tender offer details and other non-public information about client companies to family members, Yomiuri reported, weeks after the banking group was reprimanded for breaching firewalls.】

item.title: 中国全会为大宗商品牛熊提供线索
item.description: 中国大宗商品市场在进入下半年时看跌，这使人们更加期待下周在北京召开的大型政策会议将显示政府计划如何解决产能过剩和需求不振的问题。【原文：Chinese commodities markets entered the second half with a bearish tilt, raising expectations that next week’s big policy meet in Beijing will show how the government plans to approach problems around overcapacity and faltering demand.】

item.title: 收益率下降，中国债券交易员担心 "匕首刺心
item.description: 尽管今年的市场涨势空前，但中国的债券交易员们并没有什么值得庆祝的事情。【原文：Chinese bond traders have few things to celebrate despite this year’s unprecedented market rally.】

item.title: DigitalX 将在澳大利亚主要证券市场上市比特币 ETF
item.description: DigitalX Ltd.将在澳大利亚主要股票市场推出比特币交易所交易基金，成为第二家获得澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX）批准的资产管理公司。【原文：DigitalX Ltd. will launch a Bitcoin exchange-traded fund on Australia’s main stock market after becoming the second asset manager to win approval for such a product from the bourse operated by ASX Ltd.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好乔-拜登（Joe Biden）仍决心留任，因为反叛情绪日益高涨。微软出于安全考虑在中国禁售安卓设备散户投资者的 FOMO。以下是今日市场动态： — Sebastian Boyd【原文：Good morning. Joe Biden remains determined to stay as revolt grows. Microsoft bans Android devices in China on safety concerns. Retail-investor FOMO. Here’s what’s moving markets today: — Sebastian Boyd】

item.title: 亚洲最富有的银行家卷入阿达尼-欣登堡公司的争斗
item.description: 亚洲最富有的银行家乌代-科塔克（Uday Kotak）拥有的这家贷款公司已被要求协助监管机构调查卖空者对高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）帝国的攻击，这是印度对允许外国资本进入当地市场的公司进行审查的一个迹象。【原文：The lender owned by Uday Kotak, Asia’s richest banker, has been asked to assist regulators as part of their probe into the short seller attack against Gautam Adani’s empire, a sign of scrutiny on India firms that give foreign capital access to local markets.】

item.title: 交易商评估贝里尔的影响并为美联储做准备，油价保持稳定
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）就美国货币政策发表报告之前，随着贝里尔风暴的最坏影响结束，石油在连续两天的下跌之后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after a two-day decline with the worst of storm Beryl over, ahead of Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s report on US monetary policy.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将在鲍威尔讲话前平稳开盘：市场综述
item.description: 在杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）向国会作证以及美国财报季开始之前，交易员们谨慎行事，亚洲股市开局涨跌不一。【原文：Asian stocks are poised for a mixed start as traders tread cautiously ahead of Jerome Powell’s testimony to Congress and the start of the US earnings season.】

item.title: 中国 1.6 万亿美元 LGFV 债券市场缩水幅度为历年之最
item.description: 中国的地方政府融资工具正在削减其 1.6 万亿美元的债务，因为监管机构的目标是遏制该行业的信贷风险。【原文：China’s local government financing vehicles are chipping away at their $1.6 trillion pile of debt, as regulators aim to curb the sector’s credit risk.】

item.title: 泰国顶级廉价航空公司预计 2024 年核心利润将创历史新高
item.description: 泰国最大的廉价航空公司--亚洲航空公司（Asia Aviation Pcl）的所有者预计，随着海外游客激增，座位需求和机票价格的上涨，今年核心业务的盈利将创下历史新高。【原文：Asia Aviation Pcl, owner of Thailand’s biggest low-cost airline, expects record earnings from core operations this year as a surge in overseas visitors boosts seat demand and airfares.】

item.title: 散户投资者的杠杆押注威胁日本芯片制造商股票
item.description: 虽然日本 Topix 指数周四收复了历史高点，但个人交易者大量增加的保证金买入头寸正成为半导体制造商、电力公司和一些成长股的潜在阻力。【原文：While Japan’s broad Topix index reclaimed its historic high on Thursday, a large build-up of margin buying positions by individual traders is looming as a potential headwind for semiconductor makers, power companies and some growth stocks.】

item.title: 加拿大管道运营商 Wolf Midstream 计划首次出售 6 亿加元债券
item.description: 加拿大管道运营商 Wolf Midstream Canada LP 准备在本周出售 6 亿加元（4.4 亿美元）的债券，并计划设立循环信贷机制。【原文：Canadian pipeline operator Wolf Midstream Canada LP is preparing a C$600 million ($440 million) bond sale this week and plans to set up a revolving credit facility.】

item.title: 比特币矿商 Bitfarms 任命新首席执行官，Riot 收购企图升温
item.description: 比特币矿商比特大陆有限公司（Bitfarms Ltd.）从内部任命了一位新的首席执行官，因为来自被抛弃的收购方Riot Platforms Inc.的压力越来越大。【原文：Bitcoin miner Bitfarms Ltd. appointed a new chief executive officer from within its own ranks as a pressure campaign from spurned suitor Riot Platforms Inc. becomes more pronounced.】

item.title: 对冲基金在驾车季押注汽油价格下跌
item.description: 对冲基金将看跌汽油的押注增加到七年来的最高水平。【原文：Hedge funds increased their bearish gasoline bets to the highest level in seven years.】

item.title: Calpers 向第六街资产融资公司拨款超过 10 亿美元
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，加州公务员退休系统向由 Sixth Street 管理的资产融资战略投入了超过 10 亿美元。【原文：California Public Employees’ Retirement System committed more than $1 billion to an asset-based finance strategy managed by Sixth Street, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 铂金支持的 Calderys 公司重启风险债券结构，为投资者带来回报
item.description: 白金股权公司（Platinum Equity）旗下的卡尔德里斯公司（Calderys）正试图恢复一种很少见的高风险债券结构，以偿还其一只基金的投资者。【原文：Platinum Equity-owned Calderys is trying to revive a rarely seen, risky bond structure to repay investors in one of its funds.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司 11 个月来首次上调汽油价格
item.description: 随着原油价格攀升和巴西货币贬值，巴西国有石油公司 11 个月来首次上调国内汽油价格。【原文：Brazil’s state-controlled oil company is raising domestic gasoline prices for the first time in 11 months as crude prices have climbed and the value of the nation’s currency slides.】
